dataRoles.name: category
dataRoles.description: Fields to place on the horizontal or the vertical axis

dataRoles.name: group
dataRoles.description: Add a dimension to configure Small multiples/ Stacked Charts. Add two dimensions to configure Matrix - Trellis type.

dataRoles.name: ameasure
dataRoles.description: Assign data values to plot the chart.

dataRoles.name: tmeasure
dataRoles.description: Add additional data fields to be shown in the tooltip / Rules, Annotations and Analytics

dataRoles.name: textmeasure
dataRoles.description: Add additional text fields to be shown in the tooltip / Rules, Annotations and Analytics

offlineLicenseKey.description: Unlock additional capabilities with your license key. To purchase a license, visit our website http://inforiver.com

rowCount.description: Show Reduction for all row groups

columnCount.description: Show Reduction for all column groups

columnSubtotals.description: Show subtotals for all column groups

segmentLimit.description: Restricts fetching segments, ON means the fetch limits is set based on incoming data.
